text: dhikkarigalige nam'ma suspastavada vacanagalannu odi kelisaladaga avara mukhagalalli nivu tiraskaravannu kanuttiri. Avaru, tamage nam'ma vacanagalannu odikelisuttiruvavara meleye mugidu biluvaro embantiruttare. Heliri; nanu nimage idakkinta kettaddannu tilisale? Narakagni! Allahanu dhikkarigalige adanne vagdana madiruttane. Adu tira ketta neleyagide
